header.title: Web Performance Optimization
header.description: Learn the essentials of frontend performance optimization, from Core Web Vitals and rendering performance analysis to image/font/bundle optimization.

coreWebVitals.title: Core Web Vitals
coreWebVitals.description: Core metrics for user experience defined by Google. They affect search rankings and measure real user-perceived performance.

lcp.name: LCP
lcp.description: Time taken for main content to appear on screen. Measures when users perceive the page as "loaded".

inp.name: INP
inp.description: Delay time for user interactions (click, tap, keyboard). New metric replacing FID.
solutions: Move heavy calculations to Web Workers
Reduce JS bundle with code splitting
inp.simulateHeavy: Simulates heavy Work by looping on main thread.

cls.name: CLS
cls.description: Sum of unexpected layout shifts during page load. Causes users to accidentally click wrong elements.
solutions: Specify width/height or aspect-ratio for images
cls.targetContentDesc: This is the content the user is trying to read.

coreWebVitals.measurementTools: Measurement Tools: Lighthouse, PageSpeed Insights, Chrome DevTools Performance tab, Web Vitals library, Search Console

browserRendering.title: Browser Rendering Pipeline
browserRendering.description: Understanding how browsers render helps identify performance-damaging code.
browserRendering.simulatorDesc: Click buttons to see triggered pipeline stages
browserRendering.hoverMessage: Hover each stage or click buttons to explore the pipeline

javascript.name: JavaScript
javascript.details: JavaScript executes and modifies the DOM.

style.name: Style
style.details: Calculates which CSS rules apply to the modified DOM.

composite.name: Composite
composite.details: Combines multiple layers into the final screen. (GPU accelerated)

layoutThrashing.title: Layout Thrashing
layoutThrashing.description: Alternating reads/writes cause forced synchronous layout

batchUpdates.title: Batch Updates
batchUpdates.description: Read first, write later in batch

gpuAcceleration.title: GPU Acceleration (Composite Only)
gpuAcceleration.description: Changing only these properties skips Layout/Paint and is processed directly by the GPU.

devTools.title: DevTools Performance Profiling
devTools.description: Never optimize by guessing. Always follow: Measure → Identify issues → Optimize → Re-measure.
devTools.simulatorDesc: Simulating tasks on the main thread

usageSteps.step1: Open Chrome DevTools (F12) → Select Performance tab
usageSteps.step2: Click record button and perform actions to analyze (scroll, click, etc.)
usageSteps.step3: Stop recording and analyze bottlenecks in Flame Chart
usageSteps.step4: Check Scripting, Rendering, Painting times in Summary tab

longTask.title: Detecting Long Tasks
longTask.description: Tasks occupying the main thread for 50ms+. Identified by red triangle markers.
longTask.note: Long Tasks delay user interactions and directly impact INP.

layoutShift.title: Detecting Layout Shifts
layoutShift.description: Check Layout Shift events and affected elements in the Experience section.
layoutShift.note: Analyze which elements moved and how much impact they had.

fpsMonitoring.title: FPS Monitoring
fpsMonitoring.description: Check frame drops in the top FPS chart. Stuttering occurs when dropping below 60 FPS.
fpsMonitoring.note: Watch for FPS drops during scrolling or animations.

callTree.title: Call Tree Analysis
callTree.description: Find the longest-running functions in Bottom-Up / Call Tree tab.
callTree.note: Functions with high Self Time are optimization priorities.

devTools.proTip: Pro Tip: Enable "CPU 4x slowdown" before recording to simulate low-end device performance. Testing in realistic user environments is crucial.

lighthouse.title: Lighthouse Auto-Analysis
lighthouse.description: Get automatic Core Web Vitals and improvement suggestions from DevTools → Lighthouse tab.

codeSplitting.title: Code Splitting
codeSplitting.description: Keep initial JS bundles small to improve First Load speed. Load code when users actually need it.

whenToUse.title: When to Use?
items: Large pages not needed in initial render

codeSplitting.routeBasedInfo: Route-based Splitting: Next.js App Router and React Router v7+ automatically apply code splitting per page. Each route is split into independent chunks without additional configuration.

lazyLoading.title: Lazy Loading Strategies
lazyLoading.description: Load resources only when users actually need them. Reduces initial load time and prevents unnecessary network requests.
lazyLoading.simulatorDesc: Scroll down to see images load on demand

data.title: Data
data.description: Fetch only what's needed via infinite scroll or pagination

lazyLoading.warning: Warning: Don't apply lazy loading to Above the Fold content. Loading LCP elements late degrades scores.

imageOptimization.title: Image Optimization (Biggest Impact!)
imageOptimization.description: Images constitute most webpage weight. Proper optimization dramatically improves LCP.

webp.name: WebP
webp.description: Much smaller than JPEG/PNG, supported by all browsers

avif.name: AVIF
avif.description: Latest format, smallest size (Chrome, Firefox support)

checklist.title: Image Optimization Checklist
items: Apply lazy loading below the fold

fontOptimization.title: Font Optimization
fontOptimization.description: Fonts directly impact CLS and LCP. Strategies are needed to prevent FOUT (Flash of Unstyled Text) and ensure fast loading.

fout.name: FOUT
fout.description: Flashing when switching from fallback font to loaded font

foit.name: FOIT
foit.description: Text remains invisible until font loads

subset.title: Subset
subset.description: Include only used characters to reduce size

woff2.title: WOFF2 Format
woff2.description: Highest compression web font format. 30~50% smaller than TTF/OTF

variable.title: Variable Fonts
variable.description: Multiple weights/styles in one file. Replaces multiple font files

fontOptimization.koreanFontWarning: Korean Font Warning: Korean fonts are large (2~5MB) due to many glyphs. Always apply subsetting or use Google Fonts' automatic subsetting.

networkOptimization.title: Network Optimization
networkOptimization.description: Reducing network latency and effective cache usage dramatically improves performance on repeat visits.

dnsPrefetch.name: dns-prefetch
dnsPrefetch.description: Pre-perform only DNS lookup (lighter than preconnect)

preload.name: preload
preload.description: Prioritize loading resources definitely used on current page

cdnEdge.title: CDN & Edge
cdnEdge.description: Content Delivery Networks serve content from servers closest to users.

networkOptimization.staleWhileRevalidateInfo: stale-while-revalidate: Returns cached content immediately while fetching fresh data in the background. Users get instant responses and use latest data from next request.

bundleSize.title: Bundle Size Optimization
bundleSize.description: JavaScript bundle size directly impacts parsing, compilation, and execution time. Remove unnecessary code and package efficiently.
bundleSize.simulatorDesc: Remove dead code to reduce bundle size

bundleAnalyzer.title: Bundle Analyzer
bundleAnalyzer.description: Visualize bundle composition to analyze which packages consume space.

bundleSize.sideEffectsInfo: sideEffects: Declaring "sideEffects": false in package.json allows bundlers to safely remove unused exports. If CSS imports exist, specify "sideEffects": ["*.css"].
